memberdef.definition: typedef void(* ns_ble_service_specific_init_cb) (wsfHandlerId_t handlerId, struct ns_ble_control *generic_cfg, struct ns_ble_service_control *specific_cfg)
memberdef.name: ns_ble_service_specific_init_cb

briefdescription.para: Call this function from the setup_task, prior to creating the RadioTask All this does is set up NVIC priorities.
Create a BLE service based on the given configuration.

parameterdescription.para:
- a pointer to a service configuration struct. Relevant fields are:
uuid128: a 128-bit UUID for the service
name: a string name for the service, up to 31 characters
nameLen: the length of the name string
baseHandle: the first handle ID of the service. This is used by BLE to identify attributes of the service
numAttributes: keeps track of the number of attributes in the service. Initialize to 0.
poolConfig: a pointer to a WSF pool configuration struct.

memberdef.argsstring: (ns_ble_characteristic_t *c, char const *uuidString, void *applicationValue, uint16_t valueLength, uint16_t properties, ns_ble_characteristic_read_handler_t readHandlerCb, ns_ble_characteristic_write_handler_t writeHandlerCb, ns_ble_characteristic_notify_handler_t notifyHandlerCb, uint16_t periodMs, uint8_t async, uint16_t *attributeCount)
memberdef.name: ns_ble_create_characteristic

briefdescription.para: Define a characteristic for subsequent addition to a service.

parameterdescription.para: - config struct, populated by this function
- a pointer to the application's value store
- the length of the value store, in bytes
- a bitmask of properties for the characteristic, from the enum above
- a callback function for read requests if the characteristic is readable
- a callback function for write requests if the characteristic is writable
- a callback function for notify requests if the characteristic is "subscribe-able"
- the period of the notify timer, in milliseconds
- a pointer to the service's attribute count. This is incremented by the function.

briefdescription.para: Add a characteristic to a service. This function should be called after all characteristics have been defined using ns_ble_create_characteristic.

parameterdescription.para: - a pointer to the service to which the characteristic should be added
- a pointer to the characteristic to be added

briefdescription.para: Helper function to convert a 16-byte UUID string to a 128-bit UUID byte array. UUID string must be exactly 16 characters long and only contain hex characters.

parameterdescription.para: - a pointer to a 128-bit UUID byte array (uuid128.array)

briefdescription.para: Invoked by RadioTask to start the service. This function should be called after all characteristics have been added.

parameterdescription.para: - a pointer to the service to be started

briefdescription.para: Function to set the BLE TX power.
